<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>var_dictionary</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="var_dictionary">dependent_on_fieldLIKE.^use_dependent_field=true^EQ<item endquery="false" field="dependent_on_field" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="."/> <item endquery="false" field="use_dependent_field" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Hide 'Dependent on field' prefix</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { if (!current.dependent_on_field) return;
var value = current.dependent_on_field.getValue(); var firstDot = value.indexOf("."); current.dependent_on_field = value.substring(firstDot+1);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-01-19 00:03:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2e85b4b46733030091d005225685efc7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Hide 'Dependent on field' prefix</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Variables for GlideRecords" source="com.glide.vars">d653f8a03c31311068bcf327dfe37f67</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2e85b4b46733030091d005225685efc7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>russ.sarbora</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-03-27 14:53:25</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2e85b4b46733030091d005225685efc7"/> </record_update>
